page.title: 07HEALTH IN LINTON
page.content: There is a Health Centre in Linton that has three Doctors who work in the mornings and two who work in the afternoons.The average number of people that use the Health Centre each week is 480. The most common illnesses are hayfever and asthma.The centre has plenty of staff and equipment and offers a lot of services to the village such as a chiropodist.A prescription for any type of medicine costs Â£2.00. There is a village chemist,who said that he sold more paracetamol than anything else.There is also a dentist in the village and an old peoples home.The schools also provide a medical service where things like eyesight are checked and vaccinations are given.
